                           throws java.sql.SQLException,

      • saveAppointmentButtonHandler

        public void saveAppointmentButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the save button press. Validates text fields/combo boxes and uses an update SQL statement to update the data in the database. Also verifies that customers dont have conflicting appointments.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • refreshButtonHandler

        public void refreshButtonHandler​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Handles the refresh button press. Clears text fields and combo boxes and repopulates the time boxes with appropriate times. Un-disables the add appointment button.
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • withinBusinessHours

        public boolean withinBusinessHours​(java.time.LocalDateTime startPreConversion,
                                   java.time.LocalDateTime endPreConversion)
        Method to check if the added appointment time falls within business hours in EST. Converts the time to EST then compares the times to business hours.
        Parameters:
        startPreConversion - a LocalDateTime from the combo boxes, needs conversion to EST
        endPreConversion - a LocalDateTime from the combo boxes, needs conversion to EST
        Returns:
        boolean true if appt. times fall within business hours
